target_name: 자원사용 효율 제고와 청정/환경 친화 기술 및 산업공정의 도입을 통해 2030년까지 기반시설과 낙후된 산업시설을 지속가능한 환경으로 개선 및 개조하고 모든 국가들은 각자의 역량에 따라 이를 이행함

en.target: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
en.title: CO2 emission per unit of value added
en.indicator_name: CO2 emission per unit of value added
en.un_custodian_agency: International Energy Agency (IEA), United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 516 KB)
en.computation_units: Kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars
en.graph_title: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
en.source_url_text_1: Carbon dioxide emissions intensity by industry
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: National data (Type1) This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators. Download the national metadata file for more information.
